channel.title: How do i change slayer xp rate?
channel.description: how do i change slayer xp rate?? because ppl keep moaning about slayer about its long and i wanna change that so is there any1 that can help me???

item.title: How do i change slayer xp rate?
item.dc:creator: @cowbell cowbell
item.description:
@cowbell wrote:

they have to kill monsters that Vannka tells you to kill…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 04, 2009, 12:45:28 am[/size][hr][quote=“Newty, post:3, topic:277066”]Search for: playerSlayer

and when it says something about addXP(##, playerSlayer); Edit it. There will be tons of instances.

I think it is in NPCHandler.java because it has to do with NPC death. Not sure TBH[/quote]

yeah i done what you said but they isn’t a addXP(playerSlayer) btw im on a delta source

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change slayer xp rate?

item.title: How do i change slayer xp rate?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Search for: playerSlayer

and when it says something about addXP(##, playerSlayer); Edit it. There will be tons of instances.

I think it is in NPCHandler.java because it has to do with NPC death. Not sure TBH

Read full topic
